examples.text: Gel de beni şu müşkül mevkiden kurtar, bir türlü söz anlatamıyorum.
examples.translation: Please come rescue me from this difficult situation; I just can't seem to get my point across.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish مشكل (müşkil), from Arabic مُشْكِل (muškil), from أَشْكَلَ (ʔaškala, “to be ambiguous, difficult”)
